description.value: All Fellowship Tests when dealing with species not of your own have -20, as do other species making Fellowship Tests with yours. These tests may not apply between individuals with a significant trust in each other (GM is final Arbitrator). The presence of a Xenos Character aboard a human vessel is unsettling, giving -2 to Crew Morale.
